name: COVERAGE_MISC_COMMENTS
description: Table to extract comments to Clarity from coverage items. This table should not be extracted unless there are attached comments on CVG-495 or CVG-10005. If those items do contain comments, this table should be extracted for EHI compliance.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the coverage record.

columns.name: VERIFY_SOURCE_C_CMT
columns.description: Column to extract comments for CVG-495 Verification Source.

columns.name: TYPE_OF_COVERAGE_C_CMT
columns.description: Column to extract comments from CVG-10005 Type of Coverage.
